item.title: Off the Chart: Candid Conversations in Health Care
item.description: A reflection on navigating the Canadian health care system during a loved one's medical crisis, and a proposal for a convention to foster more honest, human conversations between patients and clinicians.

item.title: Capture Browser Console Logs in Rails System Tests with Capybara and Cuprite
item.description: Learn how to capture browser console logs in Rails system tests using Capybara and Cuprite, and debug JavaScript issues without slowing down test execution.

item.title: The Machines Finally Made Us Care About Documentation
item.description: AI coding assistants like GitHub Copilot are making engineers care about documentation again â€” not for their teammates, but to train the machines.

item.title: Active Storage & Form Errors: Preventing Lost File Uploads in Rails
item.description: Rails' Active Storage makes file uploads easy, but validation errors can cause attachments to be lost when forms re-render. This guide explains why and walks through a step-by-step solution using direct uploads, signed IDs, and Stimulus for an improved user experience.

item.title: Reject Nested Attributes in Rails
item.description: Learn how to use Rails accepts_nested_attributes_for and reject_if options to create flexible forms that handle nested models with optional associations.

item.title: Cover Letter Writing for Nerds
item.description: Learn how to write effective, customized cover letters for tech job applications using markdown and a markdown to PDF converter for VSCode.

item.title: Migrating From Rails Secrets to Credentials
item.description: Exploring the evolution of Rails secrets to credentials, this post investigates the deprecation of Rails.application.secrets, explains its history, and provides step-by-step solutions to address the change in legacy Rails applications.

item.title: How a Ruby Upgrade Broke MS Edge Support in a Rails App
item.description: Discover how upgrading Ruby unexpectedly caused compatibility issues with Microsoft Edge in our Rails app, and learn the debugging steps we took to resolve it.

item.title: Datadog APM for Rails on Heroku
item.description: Learn how to set up Datadog APM for a Rails application on Heroku, including installation, configuration, and tips for optimizing performance monitoring.

item.title: Fixing Gem Install Errors on M3 Mac with Ruby 2.7
item.description: A guide to resolving common gem installation errors such as `pg`, `nokogiri`, and `msgpack` when setting up a Rails project on an M3 Mac with Ruby 2.7.8, including solutions and troubleshooting steps.
